title: Tiernan Martin
text:
Tiernan Martin leads the land use policy research program at Futurewise. He focuses on the advancement of healthy, affordable, vibrant urban neighborhoods in the Puget Sound region. His approach combines expertise in geospatial data science, understanding of regulatory frameworks and processes, and experience collaborating with community leaders and local organization staff. He engages in research and advocacy with neighborhood groups, community organizations, advocacy groups, academic researchers, and government bodies.



Futurewise | Seattle, WA

Director of Research | August 2023 - present Program Manager | January 2018 - August 2023 Data and Policy Analyst | December 2015 - January 2018

Seattle Chinatown-International District Preservation & Development Authority | Seattle, WA

Research Assistant | February 2015 - October 2015




University of Washington | Seattle, WACompleted 80 credits toward a Master of Urban Design and Planning degree | 2015
McGill University | Montreal, QCB.A. in Political Science | 2008
